message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. Given its value and features, I'm asking for $14,000.  I'm confident it will be a valuable asset to you.
Hi Alice, I appreciate your offer, but given my budget constraints, I can only consider offers up to $8,000. I hope we can find a mutually beneficial solution.
Bob, I understand your budget constraints, but $14,000 is already a very competitive price for this product. How about we meet in the middle at $11,000? It's a fair deal for both of us.
Thank you for your response, Alice. While I understand the value of the product, I'm still not able to go beyond $8,000. I hope we can come to an agreement that respects both our positions.
